dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev and Prime Minister Orbán had a meeting on Tuesday, and it sounds like they're really building on that state visit from last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev and Prime Minister Orbán had a meeting on Tuesday, and it sounds like they're really building on that state visit from last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Tuesday, President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev held talks with Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orbán, according to Akorda. During the conversation, Tokayev warmly recalled his state visit to Budapest last year, during which a number of strategically important agreements were signed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the one to Budapest, right? Where they signed all those strategic agreements. It's impressive how much momentum they've kept up since then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the one to Budapest, right? Where they signed all those strategic agreements. It's impressive how much momentum they've kept up since then.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the conversation, Tokayev warmly recalled his state visit to Budapest last year, during which a number of strategically important agreements were signed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely—and they mentioned mutual trade hit nearly $200 million last year, with a huge 37% jump just in the first quarter of this year. That's not nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely-and they mentioned mutual trade hit nearly two hundred dollars million last year, with a huge thirty seven percent jump just in the first quarter of this year. That's not nothing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2024, mutual trade reached nearly $200 million, with a 37% increase in trade turnover recorded in the first quarter of this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Hungarian investment in Kazakhstan is over $370 million already. They've got 16 joint projects in the works, worth around $700 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Hungarian investment in Kazakhstan is over three hundred seventy dollars million already. They've got sixteen joint projects in the works, worth around seven hundred dollars million.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hungarian investment in Kazakhstan's economy has exceeded $370 million. The current joint investment portfolio includes 16 projects worth around $700 million in sectors such as engineering, agriculture, and logistics.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, in sectors like engineering and agriculture, which are huge for both economies. It seems like both sides are really prioritizing economic ties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, in sectors like engineering and agriculture, which are huge for both economies. It seems like both sides are really prioritizing economic ties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The current joint investment portfolio includes 16 projects worth around $700 million in sectors such as engineering, agriculture, and logistics. The President of Kazakhstan identified trade, economic, and investment cooperation as the top priority in bilateral relations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Orbán also thanked Tokayev for Kazakhstan's support with the Organization of Turkic States summit, which is coming up soon. That informal summit seems like a big deal for regional dialogue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Orbán also thanked Tokayev for Kazakhstan's support with the Organization of Turkic States summit, which is coming up soon. That informal summit seems like a big deal for regional dialogue.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He emphasized that bilateral cooperation has been developing rapidly in recent years, particularly in the economic sphere, and expressed appreciation for Kazakhstan's full support in organizing and hosting the OTS summit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, Tokayev reaffirmed Kazakhstan's commitment to the OTS priorities too. It's interesting how these bilateral meetings tie into bigger multilateral goals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, Tokayev reaffirmed Kazakhstan's commitment to the O T S priorities too. It's interesting how these bilateral meetings tie into bigger multilateral goals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Highlighting the importance of the upcoming informal summit of the Organization of Turkic States (OTS), Tokayev reaffirmed Kazakhstan's commitment to constructive dialogue on all priority areas of OTS activity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they reviewed progress on last year's energy and trade agreements—sounds like they're actually following through, which isn't always the case with these high-level talks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they reviewed progress on last year's energy and trade agreements-sounds like they're actually following through, which isn't always the case with these high-level talks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The meeting also reviewed the progress on agreements reached during last year's high-level talks, including joint projects in energy, trade, and investment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Plus, they touched on international issues. I wonder if that means broader geopolitical alignment, or just sharing perspectives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Plus, they touched on international issues. I wonder if that means broader geopolitical alignment, or just sharing perspectives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two leaders also exchanged views on current international issues.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Probably a bit of both. But you can tell both leaders are pretty pleased with how things are going—steady positive momentum, as Orbán put it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably a bit of both. But you can tell both leaders are pretty pleased with how things are going-steady positive momentum, as Orbán put it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Orban thanked President Tokayev for his visit and noted the steady positive momentum in Kazakh-Hungarian relations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's a relationship that seems to be delivering concrete results, not just diplomatic pleasantries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's a relationship that seems to be delivering concrete results, not just diplomatic pleasantries.
